sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:25:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Pound chicken breasts until thin, then season with salt and pepper. 2. Dredge chicken in flour. 3. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. 4. Add chicken and cook until golden brown on both sides. 5. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside. 6. In the same skillet, add white wine, lemon juice, capers, and chicken broth. 7. Simmer until sauce is reduced by half. 8. Stir in butter until melted and sauce is thickened. 9. Return chicken to the skillet and simmer for a few. 10. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Italian">4f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afce</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Chicken Breasts (2, boneless and skinles</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Chicken Piccata</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 30g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Pound chicken breasts. 2. Juice lemon. 3. Chop parsley.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>30ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
